sentences.en: A slapstick scene usually includes someone being hit in the face with a custard pie.
sentences.cn: 胡闹剧中通常可见到某人的脸上被牛奶蛋糊馅饼砸个正著.

sentences.en: Cartoon caricatures, slapstick comedy, and clowning articles are all based on exaggeration, she notes.
sentences.cn: 她说,有利身心的玩笑,卡通漫画, 闹剧喜剧, 诙谐文章都在运用夸张.

sentences.en: Charlie's slapstick humor gets sold fast.
sentences.cn: 查利的粗鲁(格)滑稽表演已经过时了.

sentences.en: Goofy slapstick and ridiculous out - of - date banter make the other 10 %.
sentences.cn: 蠢笨的闹剧和荒诞的过时戏谑却造成了另外的10%(与种族无关的).

sentences.en: His attempts to copy other slapstick comedians who were popular at that time were a failure.
sentences.cn: 他模仿当时受欢迎的闹剧演员的尝试失败了.

sentences.en: I prefer the dry humour of situation comedy to the slapstick of circus clowns.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢滑稽戏不动声色的幽默.不喜欢马戏小丑的低级滑稽.

sentences.en: Kino is very funny slapstick comedy full of gags from the beginning until the end.
sentences.cn: 《看电影》是一出从头到尾都充满了笑料的爆笑闹剧.

sentences.en: Real Wanzhu with these little slapstick essentially different.
sentences.cn: 真正的顽主与这些小玩闹有着本质的不同.

sentences.en: Safe return home is not slapstick, all the way security is very important.
sentences.cn: 平安回家不打闹, 一路安全很重要.

sentences.en: Such feelings infuse Ekhrajiha, which is nonetheless an odd mix of slapstick humour and mawkish sentimentality.
sentences.cn: 电影Ekhrajiha(无家可归)是一部由幽默闹剧及令人厌恶的情节组成的奇怪混合物,其中到处充斥着这种感情.

sentences.en: Taking the slapstick route, he quarried for bits and shticks, not archetypes and myths.
sentences.cn: 本着打闹剧的戏路, 他挖掘小角色与滑稽场面, 而不是主题与神话.

sentences.en: The mentally ill tend to be relegated to slapstick sub - plots, alongside a central love story.
sentences.cn: 精神病问题往往成了爱情故事这个主题之外的闹剧性次要情节.

trans.tran_en: humorous acting in which the performers fall over, throw things at each other etc
